text: Ilinka Mitreva (; 11 February 1950 – 1 August 2022) was a Macedonian politician. She was the Minister of Foreign Affairs in 2001 and again from 2002 to 2006. Mitreva was born in Skopje, SR Macedonia, SFR Yugoslavia. Mitreva died on 1 August 2022 in Skopje, North Macedonia at the age of 72.Тажна вест: Почина поранешната Министерка за надворешни работи Илинка Митрева ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Skopje Category:North Macedonian politicians
title: Ilinka Mitreva
